SELECT RCDSYN_079.ROWID AS RCDSYN_079_ROWID,
       SR_036.ROWID AS SR_036_ROWID,
       *      
FROM "SYSDICT"."SR-036" AS SR_036,
     "SYSDICT"."RCDSYN-079" AS RCDSYN_079
WHERE SR_036.ROWID IN (X'00000000', X'00000001', X'00000002') AND       
      "SR-RCDSYN" AND
      RSYN_NAME_079 = SR_NAM_036 AND
      RSYN_VER_079 = RCD_VERS_036
UNION
SELECT RCDSYN_079.ROWID AS RCDSYN_079_ROWID,
       SR_036.ROWID AS SR_036_ROWID,
       *      
FROM "SYSDICT"."SR-036" AS SR_036,
     "SYSDICT"."RCDSYN-079" AS RCDSYN_079
WHERE SR_036.ROWID IN (X'00000003', X'00000004', X'00000005') AND       
      "SR-RCDSYN" AND
      RSYN_NAME_079 = SR_NAM_036 AND
      RSYN_VER_079 = RCD_VERS_036
UNION
SELECT RCDSYN_079.ROWID AS RCDSYN_079_ROWID,
       SR_036.ROWID AS SR_036_ROWID,
       *      
FROM "SYSDICT"."SR-036" AS SR_036,
     "SYSDICT"."RCDSYN-079" AS RCDSYN_079
WHERE SR_036.ROWID IN (X'00000006', X'00000007', X'00000008') AND       
      "SR-RCDSYN" AND
      RSYN_NAME_079 = SR_NAM_036 AND
      RSYN_VER_079 = RCD_VERS_036
UNION
SELECT RCDSYN_079.ROWID AS RCDSYN_079_ROWID,
       SR_036.ROWID AS SR_036_ROWID,
       *      
FROM "SYSDICT"."SR-036" AS SR_036,
     "SYSDICT"."RCDSYN-079" AS RCDSYN_079
WHERE SR_036.ROWID IN (X'00000009') AND       
      "SR-RCDSYN" AND
      RSYN_NAME_079 = SR_NAM_036 AND
      RSYN_VER_079 = RCD_VERS_036
